SEARCH
Package grafioschtrader.reportviews.performance

Interface IPeriodHolding

public interface IPeriodHolding
Projection interface representing daily aggregated holdings and performance metrics for trading dates, usable both per individual portfolio and across the entire tenant.

Each instance provides values converted to the relevant currency (portfolio or tenant), including security positions, cumulative realized dividends, cumulative fees, cumulative interest, cash balances, external transfers, margin gains, market risk, and net gain for the day.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    double
    getAccumulateReduceMC()
    Net effect of security buy (accumulate) or sell (reduce) transactions, converted to cash
    double
    getCashBalanceMC()
    Cash balance on the date, in MC.
    LocalDate
    getDate()
    Trading date of the snapshot.
    double
    getDividendRealMC()
    Cumulative realized dividends from the start date up to and including this date, converted to the relevant currency (MC).
    double
    getExternalCashTransferMC()
    External cash transfers (deposits or withdrawals) on the date, in MC.
    double
    getFeeRealMC()
    Cumulative realized fees (negative values) from the start date up to and including this date, converted to the relevant currency (MC).
    double
    getGainMC()
    Net gain of the day:
    double
    getInterestCashaccountRealMC()
    Cumulative interest earned on cash accounts from the start date up to and including this date, converted to the relevant currency (MC).
    double
    getMarginCloseGainMC()
    Realized gain/loss from closing margin positions on the date, in MC.
    double
    getSecuritiesMC()
    Market value of all held securities on the date, in MC.
    double
    getSecurityRiskMC()
    Market risk (unrealized value) of positions on the date, in MC.
